text:
Jean Tiberi (born 30 January 1935) is a French politician. He was Mayor of Paris from 22 May 1995 to 24 March 2001. He was mayor of the 5th arrondissement of Paris and deputy to the French National Assembly from the second district of Paris.
Friend of Jean-Edern Hallier, he has been Cercle InterHallier member since 2019.
